    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlObject

        public XmlObject(ProjectOrganizer projectOrganizer,
                 UserManager userManager,
                 ResourceManager resourceManager,
                 Clock clock)
        creates a new xml object with given user userManager, project organizer and resource userManager
        Parameters:
        projectOrganizer - the projectOrganizer to add to the xml file
        userManager - the user userManager to add to the file
        resourceManager - the resource userManager to add to the file
        clock - the clock to add to the file
        Postcondition:
        a new XMLObject is created with the given parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of the parameters is null

      • toXMLString

        public java.lang.String toXMLString()
                             throws ImportExportException
        converts the system to an xml string
        Returns:
        an xml string containing all data from the system
        Throws:
        ImportExportException - when something goes wrong during the parsing of the objects

      • fromXMLString

        public static XmlObject fromXMLString(java.lang.String string)
                               throws ImportExportException
        converts an xml string to an XMLObject that can be used to reconstruct the system
        Parameters:
        string - the xml string to convert
        Throws:
        ImportExportException - when something goes wrong during the parsing of the string

        Parameters:

      • restoreFromFile

        public static XmlObject restoreFromFile(java.lang.String path)
                                 throws ImportExportException
        restores a string from a file and parses it
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        Returns:
        an xml object containing all system data
        Throws:
        ImportExportException - when something goes wrong during the parsing of the file
